title: We Will Build
description: The World Needs Protecting - Before they can build in space they have to GET into space.There is a 'false queen' attacking vampires in Asia - Bethany Anne sends her Own to look into that.The moon base needs to be settled, can Team BMW make it happen? Do they have enough people? CAN they get the right people to help?John's cousin is now part of the team, will she make it?There is a group looking to find them and they are using Barb to do it.This is the first book in the second arc (books 08-14) for The Kurtherian Gambit. The stakes are raised a lot higher!**Please note, as mentioned in another review, there is flagrantly foul language in this novel. The main character does not have a problem with cussing, just uninspired cussing.If you haven't read the previous books, you will need to go back to #1 (the book does not explain the characters and previous relationships / deeds).
author: Michael Anderle
